title: The Mermaid and the Centaur
description: The kingdom of the Black Sea is in trouble - an evil sea mage has taken their princess and the king and rules over the mermaids and the mermen, treating them as slaves. The mermen can't oppose him, for he owns a terrible sea beast which doesn't get hurt by underwater weapons. The prince of the Black Sea, Sean, and a lonely mermaid, Loreley, decide to temporarily turn into humans to search for help on the surface. Will anyone believe they're from underwater? Will anyone help them? Will they be able to defeat the evil mage? Read the book to find out!The book was written directly in English by 17-year-old Georgian and 18-year-old Australian authors. Tamuna was in Tbilisi, Georgia, and Tiegan - in Perth, Australia. They contacted each other through Facebook, built the book through the Facebook chat, then converted it into a word file and created an ebook.
author: Tamuna Tsertsvadze
